name: Alexander
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass
Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve

name: Americano
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
garnish: half an orange slice, lemon twist
preparation: Pour the Campari and vermouth over ice into a highball glass, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice and a lemon twist

name: Angel Face
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass

name: Aviation
preparation: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice
Shake well and strain into cocktail glass
Garnish with a cherry

name: Bacardi cocktail
preparation: Shake together with ice
Strain into glass and serve

name: Between the Sheets
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake, strain into chilled cocktail glass

name: Casino
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes
Shake well
Strain into chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a lemon twist and a maraschino cherry
Serve without a straw

name: Clover Club Cocktail
preparation: Dry shake ingredients to emulsify, add ice, shake and served straight up

name: Daiquiri
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes
Shake well
Double Strain in chilled cocktail glass

name: Derby
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice
Stir
Strain into a cocktail glass
Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint in the drink

name: Dry Martini
preparation: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes
Stir well
Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass
Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive

name: Fizz
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation:
All ingredients except the soda are poured in a mixing glass, dry shaken (no ice) for two minutes, then ice is added and shaken hard for another minute
Strained into a highball glass without ice and topped with soda

name: John Collins
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
ingredients: 3 cl (2 parts) freshly squeezed lemon juice
preparation: Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice
Stir gently
Garnish
Add a dash of Angostura bitters

name: Manhattan
preparation: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up

name: Mary Pickford
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass

name: Monkey Gland
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass

name: Negroni
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve

name: Old Fashioned
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water
Muddle until dissolved
Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey
Garnish with orange twist, and a cocktail cherry

name: Paradise
preparation: Shake together over ice
Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled

name: Planter's Punch
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice
Shake well
Pour into large glass, filled with ice
Add Angostura bitters, "on top"
Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple

name: Porto Flip
preparation: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with ice
Strain into glass, garnish and serve

name: Fizz
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation:
All ingredients except the soda are poured in a mixing glass, dry shaken (no ice) for two minutes, then ice is added and shaken hard for another minute
Strained into a highball glass without ice and topped with soda

name: Rusty Nail
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation: Pour all ingredients directly into old-fashioned glass filled with ice
Stir gently
Garnish with a lemon twist
Serve

name: Sazerac
preparation: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice, and set it aside
Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside
Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass
Add the lemon peel for garnish

name: Screwdriver
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation: Mix in a highball glass with ice
Garnish and serve

name: Sidecar
preparation: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice
Shake well and strain into cocktail glass

name: Stinger
preparation: Pour in a mixing glass with ice, stir and strain into a cocktail glass
May also be served on rocks in a rocks glass

name: Tuxedo
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass
Garnish with a cherry and a twist of lemon zest

name: Whiskey sour
served: On the rocks or straight up
garnish: Maraschino cherry and half orange slice
preparation: Shake with ice
Strain into chilled glass, garnish and serve

name: Sours
preparation: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice
Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass

name: Bellini
preparation: Pour peach purée into chilled glass, add sparkling wine
Stir gently

name: Black Russian
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation: Pour the ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes
Stir gently

name: Bloody Mary
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation: Stirring gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass
Garnish

name: Caipirinha
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
ingredients: Half a lime cut into 4 wedges
preparation: Place lime and sugar into old fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon)
Fill the glass with ice and add the Cachaça

name: Champagne cocktail
preparation: Add dash of Angostura bitter onto sugar cube and drop it into champagne flute
Add cognac followed by gently pouring chilled champagne
Garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry

name: Cosmopolitan
preparation: Shake all ingredients in cocktail shaker filled with ice
Strain into a large cocktail glass
Garnish with lime slice

name: Cuba Libre
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice
Garnish with lime wedge

name: French 75
preparation: Combine gin, syrup, and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice
Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled champagne glass
Top up with Champagne
Stir gently

name: The Godfather
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes
Stir gently

name: Grasshopper
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice
Shake briskly and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass

name: Harvey Wallbanger
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation: Stir the vodka and orange juice with ice in the glass, then float the Galliano on top
Garnish and serve

name: Irish Coffee
preparation:

name: Kir
preparation: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of the glass, then top up with wine

name: Long Island Iced Tea
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice
Stir gently
Garnish with lemon spiral
Serve with straw

name: Mai Tai
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice
Strain into glass
Garnish and serve with straw

name: Margarita
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice
Shake well and strain into cocktail glass rimmed with salt

name: Mimosa
preparation: Ensure both ingredients are well chilled, then mix into the glass
Serve cold

name: Mint julep
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water
Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is well frosted
Garnish with a mint sprig

name: Mojito
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
garnish: sprig of mint (Yerba buena in the original recipe), lemon slice
ingredients: 2 teaspoons sugar (or 2 cl of sugar syrup)
preparation: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice
Add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with cracked ice
Pour the rum and top with soda water
Garnish with sprig of mint leaves and lemon slice
Serve with straw

name: Sea Breeze
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice
Garnish with lime wedge

name: Sex on the Beach
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice
Garnish with orange slice

name: Tequila Sunrise
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice
Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom
Stir gently to create the sunrise effect
Garnish and serve

name: B-52
preparation: Layer ingredients into a shot glass
Serve with a stirrer

name: Barracuda
preparation: Shake pour ingredients with ice
Strain into glass, top with Sparkling wine

name: Bramble
preparation: Fill glass with crushed ice
Build gin, lemon juice and simple syrup over
Stir, and then pour blackberry liqueur over in a circular fashion to create marbling effect
Garnish with two blackberries and lemon slice

name: Dark 'n' Stormy
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation: Fill glass with ice, add rum and top with ginger beer
Garnish with lime wedge

name: Dry Martini
preparation: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes
Stir well
Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass
Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive

name: Espresso Martini
ingredients: Sugar syrup (according to individual preference of sweetness)
preparation: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake vigorously, and strain into chilled martini glass

name: French Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes
Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink

name: Kamikaze
preparation: Shake all ingredients together with ice
Strain into glass, garnish and serve

name: Lemon drop martini
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar

name: Pisco sour
preparation: Vigorously shake contents in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then strain into a glass and garnish with bitters

name: Russian Spring Punch
preparation: Pour the ingredients into an highball glass, top with Sparkling wine

name: Spritz Veneziano
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
preparation: Build into glass over ice, garnish and serve

name: Tommy's Margarita
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass

name: Vampiro
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
garnish: Salt on the rim. Chili pepper (optional)
ingredients: Few slices fresh red hot chili pepper
preparation: Pour ingredients into glass rimmed with salt
Stir

name: Vesper
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Add the garnish

name: Yellow Bird
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass
